title: news.com.au — Australia’s #1 news site
text: There are reports Labor MPs have raised concerns about Senator Kristina Keneally's handling of the Home Affairs portfolio, accusing her of unilaterally breaking bipartisan conventions on national security. The government claims it had an agreement with the opposition to pass a bill, designed to give police greater powers to stop travelers at airports. But Senator Keneally reportedly blindsided her colleagues when she supported an amendment to see the powers expire after four years. Image: News Corp Australia
